features: This personal single-serve coffee maker will meet all your brewing needs. It’s ability to be versatile and cater to your every coffee need is something that we can promise.

This personal single serve coffee maker will give you that fresh, pure taste that is required to jump start your day. Have your cup ready to drink in only 3 minutes! Hot enough to still have hot coffee with cream added. The water adjustment function allows you to control how much coffee you want to brew to save expensive grounds.

DURABLE & COMPACT DESIGN: Innovatively designed to be compact and durable, yet extremely effective, this coffee maker is much smaller than others. You will be able to fit it in tight places on countertops, office tables, etc. Brew Strength: Normal
Cleaning your machine have never been this easy! Forget to shut off your machine? Don’t worry, the machine will automatically turn off after brewing a cup of coffee.
body.description: Fast and easy to make great coffee.

WATER TANK CAPACITY HIGH PRESSURE PUMP DISHWASHER SAFE PERMANENT BREW BASKET FITS REGULAR MUGS AS WELL AS TRAVEL MUGS VOLTAGE : 110V-120V 60HZ POWER CONSUMPTION: 700W

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact, Attractive, Hot and Perfect Coffee
reviews.reviewText: Let me put it this way; I finally fell asleep at 0200, and was up and alert at 0530. <Bounces up and down excitedly>It's fast, easy, totally goes with my retro Frigidaire mini fridge, and makes a perfect cup of coffee every time.Another reviewer recommended using hot water, because cold made the coffee lukewarm. I don't doubt her word, but my experience differs from hers. I've been using cold water and my coffee is very nicely hot.Have already recommended it to a friend, and I most likely will again.UPDATE: And it just completely died after ten cups. I'll be arranging for an exchange today.ADDITIONAL: Amazon made the exchange for a replacement of the same make, model and color very fast and easy.So far, it's working great. I'll revise this again in a couple weeks.ADDITIONAL: Replacement was fast and easy, and the replacement is working fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple but awesome
reviews.reviewText: I have a standard coffee machine with all of the bells and whistles. But I wanted something simple. Don’t need a timer, it’s just for myself to make a cup at a time I don’t like Keurig. Returned one of those. This little machine is adorable, the price is rightIt makes delicious, bold coffee, quickly, and easily.. it’s a large travel size cup filled when you fill it to the max. The only downside is that larger coffee mugs might not sit well on the plate. I use a smaller stainless steel milk frothing pitcher while brewing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after 3 weeks
reviews.reviewText: It's adorable and when it was working, it worked great. I'm a teacher, have it in my classroom, and have brewed maybe 20 cups in it over the last month. All of a sudden, it won't brew. I've tried everything. It just won't. Save your money.... This cute coffee maker is junk. And of course, my return window closed two weeks ago!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Brewing cup needs a filter
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and handle. It delivers exactly one cup of hot coffee, which is great - no waste. I love black coffee, no sugar, thank you. Taste was rich, but I use Puerto Rican or Colombian coffees, so it’s the best. The only problem is that the coffee container needs a thinner mesh or a filter. The first brew had too many coffee grounds. My fix has been to buy the smallest available filters and trim them to fit the cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this single serve coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super cute. Would have given 4 stars but….
reviews.reviewText: The coffee maker is super cute and does make coffee just fine. However, my unit arrived with a defective/broken basket handle. A small detail, it’s true, but never used items shouldn’t arrive broken.FUNCTION: it makes a hot cup of coffee with little bean waste. If you like rich, dense coffee, don’t expect it from this machine though. I advise buying coffee a little darker roast than you normally would to compensate. If you prefer freshly ground coffee, a finer grind would help.STYLE: super cute! I even got a matching tea kettle. Both look great in my kitchen. I had a single serve coffee maker from another vendor and this one is lighter and more compact, making it ideal for small spaces or for portability.DURABILITY: meh. As stated, the coffee maker arrived with a defective basket handle. Half of the plastic pin that should hold it in place was missing. There was no sign of a break. It just wasn’t made correctly. The other internal pieces are made of thin, flimsy plastic. Although I’m sure this adds to the light weight of the machine, it also means it will be easy to accidentally break a part when not exercising delicate handling.All In all it’s an ok product for the price. It’s not the quality you’d expect from the brand though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It Took A Couple Of Tries BUT....
reviews.reviewText: There is nothing to dislike with this coffee maker. It took a couple of times to use the right amount of coffee and water. And, I had to use a smaller mug/coffee cup to fit where the coffee drains. What a great cup of coffee. Brew time is fast. coffee is piping hot and there really isn't much clean up needed other than the filter. AWESOME little appliance.
